directions: Mix cilantro, garlic, lime zest and juice, soy sauce, cumin, brown sugar, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. Add tofu and marinate in refrigerator for 1 hour to overnight. Remove tofu with a slotted spoon.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir marinated tofu until browned on all sides, 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cubed
1 tablespoon olive oil, or more if needed
title: Limantro Tofu
